mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ensta_account(accnt_num, profile, id, name, email, passwd, role) VALUES(#{accnt_num}, #{profile}, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{passwd}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT accnt_num FROM ensta_account WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE ensta_account SET profile=#{profile} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ensta_feed (feed_num, file_name, description, heart, regdate, accnt_num) VALUES (#{feed_num}, #{file_name}, #{description}, #{heart}, NOW(), #{accnt_num})
mapper.select: SELECT feed_num FROM ensta_feed WHERE accnt_num = #{accnt_num} ORDER BY feed_num DESC
SELECT ac.* FROM ensta_account ac INNER JOIN ensta_heart h ON ac.accnt_num = h.accnt_num WHERE h.feed_num=#{h.feed_num};

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ensta_heart (accnt_num, feed_num) SELECT #{accnt_num},#{feed_num} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ensta_heart where accnt_num = #{accnt_num} AND feed_num = #{feed_num})
mapper.select: DELETE FROM ensta_heart WHERE accnt_num = #{accnt_num} AND feed_num = #{feed_num}
